name: Chongyun
title: Frozen Ardor
description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.1: After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with <cryo>Cryo</cryo>.
description.3: "A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

description.0: Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
description.1: When the spirit blades explode, they will deal <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo> and launch opponents.
description.3: "As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"

description.0: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

When the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.
When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.
The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo> to all opponents in its path.
Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3.
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <cryo>Cryo</cryo>.
description.1: This effect can only occur once every 2s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
description.1: This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
